content: row around there should be 32 sts evenly spaced around the cuff 32 double_crochet 2-13 continue working in the round up to row 13 using a stitch marker if needed to keep track thumb hole at the end of row 13 work the thumb hole as follows 14 chain 6 skip next 6 st double_crochet in 7th st and continue working double_crochet s in the round when you reach the chain 6 again double_crochet in the chains and continue crocheting around 15-27 continue working in double_crochet in the round at the end of this row slip_stitch into the next 3 sts to create a more level row 28 chain 1 1 double_crochet in same st and in each st around join with slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet fasten_off and weave in ends thumb 1 join yarn to any st at the thumb hole double_crochet in same st and in each st around and work 1 extra st in either corner 14 double_crochet 2-4 continue working in double_crochet in the round at the end of this row slip_stitch into the next 3 sts to create a more level row 5 chain 1 1 double_crochet in same st and in each st around join with slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet 14 fasten_off and weave in ends do i have to tell you to repeat this for the other hand 😉 copyright 2013 designs byzula www byzula com i have no problem with customers using my patterns to make items and sell them i do however ask that you not pass the patterns off as your own or sell and distribute them thanks so much for being an honest and valued customer - any questions error reports or comments please don t hesitate to contact me all rights reserved
